data.title: Happy hour is nice, but only for Nachos.
data.text: If you are looking for a good value in nachos from 5-7pm then this is the place... If you want other Mexican faire, not so much. The Taco plater is OK but over priced for two tacos. It is nice to have option for margaritas in a fast food place and the salsas bar is OK, but they charge for chips...

data.title: Some great Mexican food
data.text: We dropped in on a Saturday afternoon and ordered two flauta plates.  I happen to be a long-time fan of flautas and each of us was served three and we selected the same sides: re fried beans and rice with a flour tortilla.  I was surprised at the rice.  It was delicious.  Most of the time, rice served in Mexican restaurants is not so spectacular, but this was.  All in all, it was a great meal in a modern, upscale setting.  It was a hot afternoon, but most of the patrons were enjoying the patio and when we visit the in Fall, I'm sure that where we'll find ourselves.

user_location.name: North Richland Hills, Texas, United States
